# Azure Traffic Manager
Azure Traffic Manager is a DNS-based traffic load balancer that enables you to distribute traffic optimally to services across global Azure regions. Azure Traffic Manager provides a range of traffic-routing methods to distribute traffic such as priority, weighted, performance, geographic, multi-value, or subnet.

![Azure Traffic Manager.](../images/azure-traffic-manager.png)

Choose Azure Traffic Manager when you need:

- To increase application availability.
- Improve application performance.
- Combine hybrid applications.
- Distribute traffic for complex deployments.
